Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NRC-03 (NRC-3; XXA, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: C-terminal NH2.Activity: Highly active against active against A. salmonicida 99-1 (MIC 2 uM),  A. salmonicida 97-4 (MIC 4 uM),  S. enterica serovar Typhimurium MS7953s (MIC 2 uM), S. enterica serovar Typhimurium 14028s (MIC 8 uM), P. aeruginosa K799 (MIC 2 uM), P. aeruginosa Z61 (MIC 1 uM), E. coli CGSC4908 or UB1005 or DC2 (MIC 2-8 uM), S. epidermidis C621 (MIC 8 uM), methicillin-resistant S. aureus C623 MRSA (MIC 8 uM), C. albicans C627 (MIC 4 uM). It also induces oral squamous cell carcinoma cell apoptosis via CypD-mPTP axis-mediated mitochondrial (Hou et al., 2022). Updated 7/2021; 6/2022
Literature Information.Author: Patrzykat A, Gallant JW, Seo JK, Pytyck J, Douglas SE.2003
Literature Information.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides derived from flatfish genes
